test-case.name: unabbreviatedSyntax-1
test-case.description: Evaluate the child axis of the context node (child::empnum)

test-case.name: unabbreviatedSyntax-2
test-case.description: Evaluate selecting all element children of the context node

test-case.name: unabbreviatedSyntax-3
test-case.description: Evaluate selecting all text node children of the context node

test-case.name: unabbreviatedSyntax-4
test-case.description: Evaluate selecting all children of the context node

modified.change: adapt assertion to eliminate whitespace issues

test-case.name: unabbreviatedSyntax-5
test-case.description: Evaluate selecting all the children the context node (child::node).

modified.change: adapt assertion to eliminate whitespace issues

test-case.name: unabbreviatedSyntax-8
test-case.description: Evaluate selecting the parent (parent::node()) of the context node

test-case.name: unabbreviatedSyntax-9
test-case.description: Evaluate selecting a descendant (descendant::empnum)- Select the "empnum" descendants of the context node

test-case.name: unabbreviatedSyntax-12
test-case.description: Evaluate selecting an descendant or self (descendant-or-self::employee)- Select the "employee" descendants of the context node and if the context is "employee" select it as well.

test-case.name: unabbreviatedSyntax-13
test-case.description: Evaluate self (self::employee)- Select the context node, if it is an "employee", otherwise return empty sequence This test selects an "employee" element

test-case.name: unabbreviatedSyntax-14
test-case.description: Evaluate self (self::hours)- Select the context node, if it is an "employee", otherwise return empty sequence This test selects an empty sequence.

test-case.name: unabbreviatedSyntax-15
test-case.description: Evaluate more on child/descendant (child::employee/descendant:empnum)- selects the empnum element descendants of the employee element children of the context node

test-case.name: unabbreviatedSyntax-16
test-case.description: Evaluate child::*/child::pnum - Selects the "pnum" grandchildren of the context node

test-case.name: unabbreviatedSyntax-18
test-case.description: Evaluate /descendant::pnum selects all the pnum elements in the same document as the context node.

test-case.name: unabbreviatedSyntax-19
test-case.description: Evaluate "/descendant::employee/child::pnum" - Selects all the pnum elements that have an "employee" parent and that are in the same document as the context node.

test-case.name: unabbreviatedSyntax-20
test-case.description: Evaluate "child::employee[fn:position() = 1]". Selects the first employee child of the context node.

test-case.name: unabbreviatedSyntax-21
test-case.description: Evaluate "child::employee[fn:position() = fn:last()]" selects the previous to the one "employee" child of the context node.

test-case.name: unabbreviatedSyntax-22
test-case.description: Evaluate "child::employee[fn:position() = fn:last()-1]" Selects the last but one "employee" child of the context node.

test-case.name: unabbreviatedSyntax-23
test-case.description: Evaluate "child::hours[fn:position() > 1]". Selects all the hours children of the context node other than the first hours child of the context node.

test-case.name: unabbreviatedSyntax-26
test-case.description: Evaluate "/descendant::employee[fn:position() = 12]". Selects the twelfth employee element in the document containing the context node.

test-case.name: unabbreviatedSyntax-27
test-case.description: Evaluate "/child::works/child::employee[fn:position() = 5]/child::hours[fn:position() = 2]". Selects the second hour of the fifth employee of the works whose parent is the document node that contains the context node.

test-case.name: unabbreviatedSyntax-28
test-case.description: Evaluate "child::employee[attribute::name eq "Jane Doe 11"]". Selects all "employee" children of the context node that have a "name" attribute with value "Jane Doe 11".

test-case.name: unabbreviatedSyntax-29
test-case.description: Evaluate "child::employee[attribute::gender eq 'female'][fn:position() = 5]". Selects the fifth employee child of the context node that has a gender attribute with value "female".

test-case.name: unabbreviatedSyntax-30
test-case.description: Evaluate "child::employee[child::empnum = 'E3']". Selects the employee children of the context node that have one or more empnum children whose typed value is equal to the string "E3".

result.assert-xml: <employee name="Jane Doe 9" gender="female"> <empnum>E3</empnum> <pnum>P2</pnum> <hours>20</hours> </employee><employee name="John Doe 10" gender="male"> <empnum>E3</empnum> <pnum>P2</pnum> <hours>20</hours> </employee>

test-case.name: unabbreviatedSyntax-31
test-case.description: Evaluate "child::employee[child::status]". Selects the employee children of the context node that have one or more status children.

test-case.name: unabbreviatedSyntax-32
test-case.description: Evaluate "child::*[self::pnum or self::empnum]". Selects the pnum and empnum children of the context node.

test-case.name: unabbreviatedSyntax-33
test-case.description: Evaluate "child::*[self::empnum or self::pnum][fn:position() = fn:last()]". Selects the last empnum or pnum child of the context node.
test-case.test: for $h in (/works/employee[6]) return $h/child::*[self::empnum or self::pnum][fn:position() = fn:last()]
